nodes.bodyText:
Rather than "field(s)," use "fields" or add "one or more" to the sentence. Suggested rewrites:

Header name was not specified for accessLogging logFormat fields: {0}.


Header name is missing for one or more accessLogging logFormat fields: {0}.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,10 @@ JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER=TRAS3011W: An invalid character was provided in t
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.explanation= Only letters, numbers, and : are accepted in the JSON logging field name mapping property
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.useraction= Change your JSON logging field name mapping property value to remove invalid characters
 
+JSON_ACCESS_LOG_NO_HEADER_NAME_SPECIFIED=TRAS3012W: Header name was not specified for accessLogging logFormat field(s): {0}.

nodes.bodyText: I'll address these comments in a follow-up PR so that someone else can deliver their code (which has merge conflicts with mine). Thanks for the review!
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,10 @@ JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER=TRAS3011W: An invalid character was provided in t
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.explanation= Only letters, numbers, and : are accepted in the JSON logging field name mapping property
 JSON_FIELDS_INVALID_CHARACHTER.useraction= Change your JSON logging field name mapping property value to remove invalid characters
 
+JSON_ACCESS_LOG_NO_HEADER_NAME_SPECIFIED=TRAS3012W: Header name was not specified for accessLogging logFormat field(s): {0}.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested changes to shorten the description:

Specifies the maximum number of events to send per second. To throttle the events, specify a value greater than zero.


Specifies the maximum number of events to send per second. A value greater than zero throttles the events.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,4 +25,9 @@ maxFieldLength=Maximum field length
 maxFieldLength.desc=Specifies maximum number of characters for the message field associated with the events for various sources. If you specify a value of 0 or -1, the maximum number of characters is unlimited.
 
 maxEvents=Maximum events per second
-maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.
\ No newline at end of file
+maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.

nodes.bodyText: This message has already been GAed. If you think this message will have a significant impact to the customer, I can make the change - but otherwise, I think we can leave it as it is.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,4 +25,9 @@ maxFieldLength=Maximum field length
 maxFieldLength.desc=Specifies maximum number of characters for the message field associated with the events for various sources. If you specify a value of 0 or -1, the maximum number of characters is unlimited.
 
 maxEvents=Maximum events per second
-maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.
\ No newline at end of file
+maxEvents.desc=Specifies the maximum number of events to be sent per second. If you specify a value greater than zero, then it will be used for throttling the events.
